archimate:Device.name: Large Conference Room or Auditorium AV Solution (LGCR/AAVS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Large-scale telehealth sessions, hospital-wide briefings, boardroom meetings, educational/training sessions, community outreach webinars.
Specifications:
• Audio Quality: High-fidelity audio with advanced digital signal processing (DSP), adaptive echo cancellation
• Video Resolution: 4K UHD (3840x2160), multi-camera support for different views
• Connectivity Options: HDMI, USB, Ethernet, Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points), Bluetooth 5.1, SDI connections for professional setups
• Microphone Sensitivity: Professional-grade ceiling or table-mounted microphones, clear audio pickup range of 20+ feet Multiple microphone arrays for comprehensive coverage and noise suppression
• Speaker Quality: Room audio system (integrated ceiling or wall-mounted speakers, minimum 50W per channel)
• Camera Specifications: Professional PTZ 4K cameras, remote-controlled, optical zoom (10x minimum), autofocus, auto-framing
• Integration Compatibility: Seamless integration with conferencing platforms (Microsoft Teams Rooms, Zoom Rooms, Cisco WebEx, etc.) Compatible with hospital information systems, live streaming options
• Ease of Setup: Professional installation and setup, easy-to-operate control panel with automated presets
• Form Factor: Modular professional-grade components (camera, speakers, microphones, controller) integrated into conference room architecture
• Power Requirements: AC power with dedicated surge protection, centralized UPS (uninterruptible power supply) recommended for reliability
